text: The Johnston's African dormouse (Graphiurus johnstoni) is a species of rodent in the Gliridae family. It is found in Malawi, Zambia, and Zimbabwe. Its natural habitat is moist savanna. ==References== *Holden, M. E.. 2005. Family Gliridae. Pp. 819-841 in Mammal Species of the World a Taxonomic and Geographic Reference. D. E. Wilson and D. M. Reeder eds. Johns Hopkins University Press, Baltimore. * Schlitter, D. 2004. Graphiurus johnstoni. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 29 July 2007. Category:Graphiurus
title: Johnston's African dormouse
